In the end this fix was not included in 0.4.
Can you check if it's due to the indexing issues I pointed? Specifically, if changing in some cases to use index_select the makes your code run faster?

body:
In the end this fix was not included in 0.4.
Can you check if it's due to the indexing issues I pointed? Specifically, if changing in some cases to use `index_select` the makes your code run faster?
